overview_of_class:
Vertebrate Phylogeny illustrated via comparative morphology; anatomical/functional and ontogenetic considerations; dissections.

Class meets at Field Museum of Natural History. Transportation will be provided.
name: Anatomy of Vertebrates
title: WCAS BIOL_SCI 344-0-20 Anatomy of Vertebrates
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-requisite: Students must have completed BIOL_SCI 215 and BIOL_SCI 222 to register for this course.
